alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Pulaski; Van Buren; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:23AM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Arkansas, eastern Arkansas and north central Arkansas, including the following counties, in central Arkansas, Faulkner, Lonoke, Prairie, Pulaski and White. In eastern Arkansas, Jackson and Woodruff. In north central Arkansas, Cleburne, Independence and Van Buren. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1023 AM CST, the public reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... North Little Rock, Conway, Sherwood, Jacksonville, Cabot, Searcy, Maumelle, Newport, Heber Springs, Augusta, Des Arc, Little Rock AFB, Beebe, Greenbrier, Ward, Vilonia, Bald Knob, Mayflower, Austin in Lonoke County and Judsonia.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Pulaski; Van Buren; White; Woodruff
